name: Justiciar
text: You become the embodiment of justice, a champion of righteousness and fairnessâ€”at least as viewed from the perspective of your particular faith. You are granted the ability to shelter and protect your allies and others in need, while also receiving powers that help you do the right thing according to the faith you have embraced.

features.justAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, each enemy adjacent to you is weakened until the end of its next turn
features.justSpirit(11thLevel): Each ally adjacent to you can reroll one saving throw at the end of his or her turn
features.justShelter(16thLevel): Allies adjacent to you are immune to fear and charm effects and receive a +1 bonus to saving throws

flavorText: I fight for justice, my faith and my strong arm defending those in need.
